purpose: The email announces two full-time, permanent lecturer/senior lecturer positions available at Massey University in New Zealand, specifically within the School of Mathematical & Computational Sciences. The university is looking for candidates with expertise in AI, cybersecurity, software engineering, or human-computer interaction. The roles involve teaching and supervising students at both undergraduate and postgraduate levels, as well as leading research initiatives and seeking external funding. Interested applicants can find more details and application instructions through the provided link.
